pr_title: Added tests to get to 100% coverage in zts

timeline.message: Added tests to get to 100% coverage

timeline.bodyText: Removed the try / catch as the catch could never happen. The inner methods already catch the exceptions
timeline.author: OferLevi85

timeline.bodyText: At this point we already check that the record is valid and so it could never be nulll
